screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .weavelibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: WEAVELIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: You can manage libraries of weaves through Painter's Weaves Library Panel. To access the Select Window → Media Panels → Weaves Library Panel . You can create new weaves, modify weaves, and import or export weave libraries in the panel.
NOTE: WEAVELIBRARY files are similar to .ABR files, which store brushes Photoshop users import or export to open or create brushes for the Photoshop application.
